text: 1:8 Matyu 28:19; Mak 16:15; Luk 24:47-48; Jon 15:27; Aposel 2:32; 3:15; 5:32Godɨn Duam izighirɨ ia gizɨvaghtɨ, ia an gavgavim iniam. Eghtɨ bizir ia ganigha foziba, ia Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiamɨn aven ko, Judian danganiba bar moghɨra ko, Samarian Distrik ko, nguazir kamɨn danganiba bar, me geghanam.”
